entry.title: Friday: Chance of showers. High 9. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 60 percent chance of showers. Risk of a thunderstorm this afternoon. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h this afternoon. High 9. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM PDT Friday 24 March 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Chance of showers. Low zero. POP 60%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 60 percent chance of showers early this evening with risk of a thunderstorm. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light near midnight. Low zero. Forecast issued 05:00 AM PDT Friday 24 March 2023
